title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.10 - Joint fiduciaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.10 - Joint fiduciaries

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 8(f) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-105(f)

If two or more fiduciaries are acting jointly for any
individual under disability or for any estate or trust, the City of Yonkers
earnings tax return for such individual or such estate or trust required under
this Part may be made and filed by any one of such
fiduciaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
263.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
